abstract: Michael Kirban, the founder of Vita Coco, the coconut-water beverage start-up whose eponymous drink has been hit among celebrities, has turned down multimillion-dollar investments from beverage giants Coke and Pepsi, The New York Post reported.
snippet: Michael Kirban, the founder of Vita Coco, the coconut-water beverage start-up whose eponymous drink has been hit among celebrities, has turned down multimillion-dollar investments from beverage giants Coke and Pepsi, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: Michael Kirban, the founder of Vita Coco, the coconut-water beverage start-up whose eponymous drink has been hit among celebrities, has turned down multimillion-dollar investments from beverage giants Coke and Pepsi, The New York Post reported.

headline.main: Founder of Vita Coco Said to Turn Down Big-Name Investors
